title: NEUTRON -- Sci-Fi Atmospheric Music Vol. III
description: Music pack containing 10 high fidelity Sci-Fi & Atmospheric tracks.
longDescription:
The pack contains ten pieces of music designed mainly for Open World, Sci-Fi or Futuristic RPGs. They will also fit any mysterious atmospheric project from games to trailers or advertising. The tracks were tested in various conditions (Headphones: studio/consumer, Speakers :PC and TV HI-FI /consumer, Studio Monitors) to offer the best possible result.


This is the third volume of the "Sci-Fi Atmospheric Music" series.It has all the properties of previous volumes and blends perfectly with them. All the tracks are handcrafted using multiple sound layers and harmonies avoiding one key strokes and repetition of premade sound libraries.


Album Trailer on SoundCloud


Album Playlist on YouTube (Made in UE4)


For any questions or custom work: Alex.M


Signals      - 4.05 min

Outpost      - 4.35 min 

Center Or Nothing - 4.13 min

Exodus      - 4.00 min

White Path    - 4.29 min

Grains      - 4.17 min

Phosphorus    - 4.13 min

The Fallen    - 4.08 min

------------------------------------------------

Vox Machina    - 4.00 min (UE4 Marketplace Exclusive)

Lex Machina    - 4.00 min (UE4 Marketplace Exclusive)

------------------------------------------------

Enjoy and Thank you for your time!
technicalDetails:
Features:


 High fidelity.

 High Quality Mix and Master.

 Easily combined with other music genres.

 Specially composed for smooth transition to/from other tracks.

 2 UE4 Exclusive Tracks


Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10


Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16bit (Higher quality can be provided upon request)


Does music loop: No


Minutes of audio provided: 42


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: N/A

Important/Additional Notes: N/A
